SELECT bp.post_id AS post_id, bp.channel_id AS channel_id, u.nickname AS nickname, bp.title AS title, bp.view_count AS view_count, bp.recommendation_count AS recommendation_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comments WHERE post_id = bp.post_id) AS comment_count, TO_CHAR(bp.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS formatted_created_at FROM board_posts bp JOIN users u ON bp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE bp.channel_id = #{channelId} AND bp.is_public = TRUE
ORDER BY bp.created_at DESC, bp.post_id DESC
AND DATE(bp.created_at) = CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY bp.recommendation_count DESC, bp.post_id DESC
AND DATE(bp.created_at) >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' ORDER BY bp.recommendation_count DESC, bp.post_id DESC
AND DATE(bp.created_at) >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month' ORDER BY bp.recommendation_count DESC, bp.post_id DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT bp.post_id AS post_id, bp.channel_id AS channel_id, bp.user_id AS user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, bp.title AS title, bp.content AS content, bp.view_count AS view_count, bp.recommendation_count AS recommendation_count, TO_CHAR(bp.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS formatted_created_at, TO_CHAR(bp.updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS formatted_updated_at FROM board_posts bp JOIN users u ON bp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE bp.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_posts (user_id, channel_id, title, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{channelId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId}
